nodes.explanation: mentions of being in the spotlight
instances where something or someone is under intense public scrutiny or attention
The neuron is looking for mentions of something being under public scrutiny or receiving attention from the public or media
instances where the word "spotlight" is used in context
mentions or references to being in the spotlight or receiving attention, especially in the media or public eye
keywords or phrases related to attention or focus
mentions of being the center of attention or focus, particularly in a public context
the word "spotlight" as well as related phrases where attention or focus is placed on someone or something
